title: The Dan Bongino Sunday Special 12/26/21
description:
First up is Astrophysicist Hugh Ross, founder and president of Reasons to Believe talked about what an absolute miracle our planet is and how there’s no other explanation for our creation than a divine creator. Then Author Lee Strobel, who just wrote "The Case For Christmas" came on to talk about the birth of Jesus, truths and myths, and the meaning of the Christmas Season. Finally, we have the great Bo Snerdley, James Golden, Rush Limbaugh’s longtime producer shared his experiences working with the legendary GOAT of talk radio, and his new book Rush On The Radio.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

Then Author Lee Strobel, who just wrote "The Case For Christmas" came on to talk about the birth of Jesus, truths and myths, and the meaning of the Christmas Season. Finally, we have the great Bo Snerdley, James Golden, Rush Limbaugh’s longtime producer shared his experiences working with the legendary GOAT of talk radio, and his new book Rush On The Radio.
